verses.roman:
dūra haite kṛṣṇe dekhi' bale gopī-gaṇa
"ei dekha kuñjera bhitara vrajendra-nandana"

synonyms: dūra haite—from a distance; kṛṣṇe—unto Kṛṣṇa; dekhi'-seeing; bale—said; gopī-gaṇa—all the gopīs; ei dekha—just see here; kuñjera—the bush; bhitara—within; vrajendra-nandana—the son of Nanda Mahārāja.
translation: "Just see!" the gopīs said, seeing Kṛṣṇa from a distant place. "Here within a bush is Kṛṣṇa, the son of Nanda Mahārāja."
